headline: EUROVISION 🇮🇱🚫 SLAMS DOOR on GOVT VOTE-RIGGING 🗳️💥 – ISRAEL PUBLIC VOTE QUEEN 👑📈 but NEW RULES SLICE VOTES to 10 😤📉 NO MORE STATE SIMPS SPAMMING!
text:
EUROVISION 🎤🌍 DROPPING RULEBOMBS 💣📜 after ISRAEL 🇮🇱🔥 SLAYED the PUBLIC VOTE 🗳️💦 in May's MALMO MADNESS 😱 – Yuval Raphael 👩‍🎤💃 snagged TOP PUBLIC SPOT 👑📈 but JURY VIBES 🧑‍⚖️📊 PUSHED her to SILVER 🥈 while AUSTRIA'S JJ 🧔🎸 WASTED LOVE 🍆💔 on the WINNER THRONE! Countries like SPAIN 🇪🇸😡, IRELAND 🍀🤬, SLOVENIA 🇸🇮🚫, ICELAND 🇮🇸❄️ and NETHERLANDS 🇳🇱🌷 THROWING SHADE ☀️🚫, threatening BOYCOTT DRAMA 👻 if ISRAEL shows up to VIENNA 2026 🎉🏰 – cuz GAZA WAR VIBES 🪖💥 got 'em SALTY AF 😣🧂!

MARTIN GREEN 🎤👨‍💼 spilling the TEA ☕📢: 'FANS + MEMBERS YELLING 😰📣 for RULE GLOW-UP ✨ after 2025 SHENANIGANS! NO MORE THIRD-PARTY GOVT CAMPAIGNS 🚫🏛️💸 – ISRAELI AGENCY 💰🇮🇱 DROPPED ADS + STATE INSTA SPAM 📱🔥 to RIG VOTES like a GEOPOLITIC RAVE 🥳🗳️!' Fans now LIMITED to 10 VOTES EACH 📉🖐️ (bye-bye 20-vote SPAMFEST 💦🚫), JURIES BACK in SEMIS 🧑‍⚖️🥉 for FAIR PLAY ⚖️😤, and BROADCASTERS/ARTISTS BANNED from GOVT HYPE SQUADS 🤝🚫! 'KEEP GEOPOLITICS OFF THE STAGE 🎭🌍 – this is MUSIC UNITY ORGY 💃🕺 not WAR ROOM RUMBLE!'

EBU 🏛️📺 CANCELLED NOVEMBER ISRAEL VOTE 🚫🗳️🇮🇱 cuz MIDEAST CEASEFIRE CHAOS 🕊️💥, PUSHING DEETS to DECEMBER MEETUP 🤝📅 – but GREEN's like 'THESE FIXES GONNA CHILL EVERYONE OUT 🧊😌, NO NEED FOR DRAMA VOTES!' AUSTRIA'S ORF 📡🇦🇹 BEGGING NO BOYCOTTS 🙏 – VIENNA READY to HOST THIRD TIME 🏰🥳 (last in 2015 when CONCHITA WERKED 👩‍🦰💅) at WIENER STADTHALLE 🎪 on MAY 16 FINAL 📅🏆 with SEMIS EARLIER that WEEK! BBC 🇬🇧📺 tuning in for UK SIMPS 🤩.

GREEN NOT POINTING FINGERS 👉🚫 but ADMITS 'UNDUE PROMO by GOVERNMENTS 🏛️📣 was OUTTA WHACK 😵‍💫 with EUROVISION SPIRIT 🎶❤️!' Hoping for IMPARTIAL NEUTRAL ZONE 🕊️⚖️ – NO MORE INSTRUMENTALIZED CONTEST 🎤🚫♟️! Israel fans STILL SIMPING HARD 🤤🇮🇱 for that PUBLIC LOVE BOMB 💣❤️, but RULES NOW SLAPPING BACK like a BAD VIBE CHECK ❌😤. 2026 GONNA BE WILD 🎉🔥 – WILL ISRAEL SLIDE IN or GET VETO'D? STAY TUNED 📺👀 for the POP DRAMA! 💥🎵
